com.adactin.Mobileapphoteladactin1.util

Class ScreenshotCapture

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adactin.Mobileapphoteladactin1.base.BaseClass
      • com.adactin.Mobileapphoteladactin1.util.ScreenshotCapture

  • public class ScreenshotCapture
extends BaseClass
    The class has methods to take step by step screenshots and also to take screenshots when any error occurs. It also has a method to get Date in String format.
    Author:
    shwetabinu
